summary: On Christmas Eve, Francesca sets out for Rotterdam in order to find her little sister, who has run off with her musician boyfriend. On the way, she picks up Gerlinde, a heartbroken older woman at the end of her rope.
cast: Hannelore Elsner|Esther Zimmering|Kim Schnitzer|Egbert Jan Weeber|Aykut Kayacik|Inger Hansen|Evert Aalten|Maarten Hemmen|Angelo Colagrossi|Tygo Gernandt|Jürgen Rißmann|Gianfranco Russo|Nina Vorbrodt
keywords: female nudity|rebellious teenager|teenage girl|female taxi driver|musician
title: Vivere
